CustomField.description: Enable this setting to allow ascend to automatically delete any sibling household AccountContactRelation (ACR) records when a new household ACR is created. This is mostly to allow for data migration to merge households easily by loading ACR records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable this setting to allow ascend to automatically delete any sibling household AccountContactRelation (ACR) records when a new household ACR is created. This is mostly to allow for data migration to merge households easily by loading ACR records.
CustomField.label: Enable Auto ACR Deletion (DEPR)
